scripts.build: yarn --cwd apps/commons build && (yarn --cwd apps/backend build & yarn --cwd apps/frontend build)
scripts.lint: yarn --cwd apps/commons lint && yarn --cwd apps/frontend lint && yarn --cwd apps/backend lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf apps/commons/dist/ lint && rm -rf apps/backend/dist/ lint && rm -rf apps/frontend/.next/
scripts.dev: (yarn workspace @sigmafit/commons watch  & yarn workspace @sigmafit/backend dev & yarn workspace @sigmafit/frontend dev)
